review: Haven't used much but seems cool. Good quality picture though.
author: Troonus

review: Love it. The image is extremely crispy when you watch youtube. The only problem is, you might consider upgrade your bandwidth if it is not enough.
author: Ninja Shaw

review: I have been using this little device since I purchased it some years ago and it has never let me down.
author: Paul W. O'Brien

review: Fantastic product, I wanted something simple to replace my Apple TV and this was a fantastic option. I think this is 10x better in almost every way except that most if not all of the applications I have used do not have auto play and that gets very frustrating when I want to have Netflix on in the background while I am doing work. But I guess that's not the chrome casts fault but the developers.
author: Nitzan Levi
